cards.title: Encode & Decode
cards.text: Full round-trip support with robust pixel detection and easy APIs.

cards.title: 2D Codes
cards.text: QR Code, Micro QR, Data Matrix, PDF417, Aztec, GS1, and more.

cards.title: 1D Barcodes
cards.text: Code 128, GS1-128, Code 39/93, EAN/UPC, ITF-14, and more.

cards.title: Payment Helpers
cards.text: SEPA Girocode, Swiss QR Bill, BezahlCode, UPI, and crypto addresses.

cards.title: AOT & Trim Ready
cards.text: No reflection tricks. Native AOT compatible and aggressively trimmed.

cards.title: Cross-Platform
cards.text: Runs on Windows, Linux, macOS, .NET Standard 2.0+, .NET 8+.

cards.title: Multiple Outputs
cards.text: Render to PNG, SVG, PDF, EPS, HTML, ASCII, and raw bitmaps.
